source with entity referring words: The [[professor]] explained to the [[students]] that [[they]] should use the [[authors']] last names, not their first names.
source with headwords: The [[professor]] explained to the [[students]] that they should use the [[authors']] last names, not their first names.
vanilla translation: Il professore ha spiegato agli studenti che dovrebbero usare i cognomi degli autori, non i loro nomi.
translation with gender structures: [[Il professore/La professoressa]] ha spiegato [[agli studenti/alle studentesse]] che dovrebbero usare i cognomi [[degli autori/delle autrici]], non i loro nomi.

source: The professor preferred to talk to the nurse rather than the doctor.
source with entity referring words: The [[professor]] preferred to talk to the [[nurse]] rather than the [[doctor]].
source with headwords: The [[professor]] preferred to talk to the [[nurse]] rather than the [[doctor]].
vanilla translation: Il professore preferiva parlare con l'infermiere piuttosto che con il dottore.
translation with gender structures: [[Il professore/La professoressa]] preferiva parlare con [[l'infermiere/l'infermiera]] piuttosto che con [[il dottore/la dottoressa]].

source: The psychologist wanted to talk about some patients with the psychiatrist.
source with entity referring words: The [[psychologist]] wanted to talk about some [[patients]] with the [[psychiatrist]].
source with headwords: The [[psychologist]] wanted to talk about some [[patients]] with the [[psychiatrist]].
vanilla translation: Lo psicologo voleva parlare di alcuni pazienti con lo psichiatra.
translation with gender structures: [[Lo psicologo/La psicologa]] voleva parlare di [[alcuni/alcune]] pazienti con [[lo/la]] psichiatra.

source: The students wrote to the principal to complain about the professor.
source with entity referring words: The [[students]] wrote to the [[principal]] to complain about the [[professor]].
source with headwords: The [[students]] wrote to the [[principal]] to complain about the [[professor]].
vanilla translation: Gli studenti hanno scritto al preside per lamentarsi del professore.
translation with gender structures: [[Gli studenti/Le studentesse]] hanno scritto [[al/alla]] preside per lamentarsi [[del professore/della professoressa]].

source: Only six students have submitted their essays so far, so the professor is worried that the others may be falling behind.
source with entity referring words: Only six [[students]] have submitted their essays so far, so the [[professor]] is worried that the [[others]] may be falling behind.
source with headwords: Only six [[students]] have submitted their essays so far, so the [[professor]] is worried that the [[others]] may be falling behind.
vanilla translation: Solo sei studenti hanno presentato i loro saggi finora, quindi il professore è preoccupato che gli altri possano rimanere indietro.
translation with gender structures: Solo sei [[studenti/studentesse]] hanno presentato i loro saggi finora, quindi [[il professore/la professoressa]] è [[preoccupato/preoccupata]] che [[gli altri/le altre]] possano rimanere indietro.

source: We have a wonderful, amazing, fast and skillful cook.
source with entity referring words: [[We]] have a wonderful, amazing, fast and skillful [[cook]].
source with headwords: [[We]] have a wonderful, amazing, fast and skillful [[cook]].
vanilla translation: Abbiamo un cuoco meraviglioso, straordinario, svelto e abile.
translation with gender structures: Abbiamo [[un cuoco meraviglioso/una cuoca meravigliosa]], [[straordinario/straordinaria]], [[svelto/svelta]] e abile.

source: The Panamanian writer married to my cousin’s professor is coming to live with us for a while.
source with entity referring words: The Panamanian [[writer]] married to my [[cousin’s]] [[professor]] is coming to live with [[us]] for a while.
source with headwords: The Panamanian [[writer]] married to my [[cousin’s]] [[professor]] is coming to live with [[us]] for a while.
vanilla translation: Lo scrittore panamense sposato con il professore di mio cugino viene a vivere con noi per un po' di tempo.
translation with gender structures: [[Lo scrittore/La scrittrice]] panamense [[sposato/sposata]] con [[il professore/la professoressa]] di [[mio cugino/mia cugina]] viene a vivere con noi per un po' di tempo.
